title: Blank / Missing Summoner Icon
body: Recently I've been spending my Blue Essence on mystery summoner icons, and following buying a few today I got this weird icon. I just wanted to highlight this bug as I'm unsure if anyone has seen it before. When I click on my profile in the league client it shows the standard bot icon and other times its just completely blank.

replies.body: I got this exact same "icon" today after I purchased a mystery icon. I'm not sure how it works, can't find any other info about it
Hi PotatoGodz, see my reply to zantheon for details, but basically the icon you got will work properly when patch 8.8 launches next week.

They're icons that are meant to be part of the mystery minis in the mid year Essence Emporium (BE shop). There seems to be an issue with them being rewarded in the mystery icons (which they aren't meant to be a part of yet even once the emporium opens).

I'd recommend submitting a ticket. They may not be able to do anything yet, or they may have to wait until the shop opens, or you might just get the icon when the shop opens and the icons are active. Really don't know, but support should be able to point you in the right direction at any rate.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Hi zantheon, you've run into an issue here that is unique to OCE as the blue essence version of mystery icons is actually not supposed to be available right now.
Seras Dragon is right that the icon you got isn't actually in the game yet, but it exists in the store system and can still be added to your account as something that you "own". Hence why you can select it but it shows up blank.

When the patch next Wednesday lands the icon will show up as expected.
